title: Shortcake Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Hanayo-chan, do you know? I heard that today is Shortcake Day~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh!? Is that so? I didn’t know that. You’re very knowledgeable, huh, Chika-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe. I only just saw it on the news this morning though~. So, it looks like shortcakes are going to be cheaper today! I saw a store with a poster that mentioned that on the way here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeeeeh!? I can’t believe I never knew about such a great day until now....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Fufufu.... But, now we both know, right~? So, you know, we have to....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Chika-san, let’s go buy some!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’ve been waiting for you to say that~! Let’s also invite everyone else!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah♪ I’ll message Rin-chan and the others. Oh, let’s ask the rest of Nijigaku too.... there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’ll also message You-chan.... and sent. Ah, she replied so quickly. She said that she and the others want to go too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s the same on my end. Fufu, looks like it’s going to be a shortcake party~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
